Subject: add some method on org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183106698

hi,developers,

I want use lucene to index the Arcfile, and save the url posion into the index .

At first I want write my own ARCReader from extends the org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader,

But the variable "InputStream in" is protected and I can't get it from my class.

Would you like change 

protected InputStream in = null;

to public or add this method :

public long getPoint() throws IOException{
    	return ((Position)this.in).getFilePointer();
    }


?

ansi
